member.name: T:StructureMap.MementoSource
member.summary: Abstract class that is the supertype of all storage and retrieval mechanisms of InstanceMemento instances

member.name: M:StructureMap.MementoSource.GetMemento(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the named InstanceMemento
member.param: The instanceKey of the requested InstanceMemento

member.name: M:StructureMap.MementoSource.GetAllMementos
member.summary: Retrieves an array of all InstanceMemento's stored by this MementoSource

member.name: M:StructureMap.MementoSource.containsKey(System.String)
member.summary: Template pattern method. Determines if the MementoSource contains a definition for the requested instanceKey.

member.name: M:StructureMap.MementoSource.retrieveMemento(System.String)
member.summary: Template pattern method. Retrieves an InstanceMemento for the instanceKey

member.name: P:StructureMap.MementoSource.SourceType
member.summary: The type of MementoSource

member.name: P:StructureMap.MementoSource.Description
member.summary: String description of the MementoSource. Used in the StructureMap-Client UI.

member.name: M:StructureMap.Source.EmbeddedFolderXmlMementoSource.#ctor(StructureMap.Source.XmlMementoStyle,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Implementation of MementoSource that stores and retrieves an XmlInstanceMemento per Embedded Resource file in a named namespace. EmbeddedFolderXmlMementoSource is meant to simplify complicated object graph configurations by isolating each instance to a separate editable file.
member.param: NodeNormalized or AttributeNormalized
The name of the Assembly with the embedded resources
The root namespace of all of the mementos.
The file extension of the memento files - "xml"
